alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 3:31PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact southern Orange County and southwestern Riverside County through 400 PM... At 326 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Elsinore and Lakeland Village, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and weather station observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds may knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Elsinore, Murrieta, Menifee, southern Santa Ana Mountains included the Ortega Highway, Wildomar, Lakeland Village, Quail Valley, Santa Rosa Plateau and Sedco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Small hail has been reported.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
